HEADER.Title: Common logging of apache http server home

SCRIPT.MSCRI: ! APACHE SERVER HOME LOGGING : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Apache HTTP server home" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_AHS_APACHE_HOME#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM

DOCU_Docu.DOC: Common AE script to log Apache Server Home.
